PCL Library  version 5.11
provides all the needed APIs to control your Ingenico device (iSMP, iSMP Companion and iCMP)

Administration

Modules

 Companion Configuration
 Companion Configuration Functions.
 
 Companion Power Management Configuration
 Set of functions to control the power management of the Companion.
 
 ICAdministration Initialization
 Steps in order to initialize the ICAdministration object.
 
 Performing Transactions
 All methods and structures necessary to perform a transaction on the Companion.
 
 Performing printing
 All methods and structures necessary to perform text or bitmap printing on the Bluetooth Printer paired with the Companion. A printing session must already be opened before calling all these methods, otherwise the call returns immediately with a failure value.
 
 Printing over the Administration Channel
 Print receipts composed of text and bitmaps from the Companion on the iDevice applications.
